mapper.select: SELECT ci.id, ci.user_id, ci.sku_id, ci.cart_price, ci.sku_num, ci.img_url, ci.sku_name, si.price sku_price FROM cart_info ci JOIN sku_info si ON ci.sku_id = si.id WHERE ci.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_info ( user_id, sku_id, cart_price, sku_num, img_url, sku_name ) SELECT #{userId} ,sku_id,cart_price ,sku_num,img_url,sku_name FROM cart_info cc WHERE cc.user_id=#{tempId} ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cart_info.`sku_num` = cart_info.`sku_num` + cc.sku_num
